Maggie has a sudden vision of a grotesque creature which causes her to fall backwards in fear
The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out
A sudden scene change to toast popping out of a toaster might startle some viewers
There is a second explosion (much louder and more violent than the initial one)
During a dream sequence a hand suddenly breaks through the window in front of Shideh
A figure moves past in the reflection of the window
Shideh looks through the peep hole in the door and sees a figure pass quickly through the hallway
Shideh sees a floating figure on the stairs
The floating spectre suddenly appears close to the camera
“Dorsa” looks up to reveal it is not her but an entity with a large set of teeth
The floating spectre suddenly grabs Dorsa
The mannequin on the floor springs up as the man touches it
A mannequin suddenly crashes through the window
The man opens a door, and a cackling mannequin jumps out at him from inside
The mirror suddenly smashes by itself
The curtain suddenly flies up by itself
There is a sudden cut to a creepy mannequin sitting on a chair with a loud sound cue
The mannequin opens its arms and springs forward towards the camera
The killer steps in front of Molly from the side accompanied by a sound cue
A man appears outside the window while the couple in the car are making out
After Caleb says “This was a mistake,” a friend jumps out from the back seat to scare them as a joke
The car is suddenly hit, causing it to shake
Caleb is dragged back in through the window while Tanner and Jessica are trying to pull him out
While Reece is moving closer towards the dead body, Jessica suddenly jumps out from underneath it
As a person approaches the window from outside, there is a sudden flash with a loud noise
Bloody Mary suddenly appears on the road while Tom is driving
Bloody Mary grabs Buck from under the bed
David is suddenly grabbed from behind with a plastic bag over his face
While Samantha is walking, Bloody Mary suddenly flashes on the screen
Samantha is startled by a steam pipe suddenly going off
There is a sudden flash
The camera cuts from Bill back to Bloody Mary to show her face has changed
The running woman stops to catch her breath, and as the camera begins to spin around her she is suddenly hit with a club
Nacho jumps out from behind a door as a joke
A club suddenly breaks the front window of the car
The killer drops down to the ground and looks at Vasco
A car’s headlights suddenly turn on in the background
The camera focuses on a framed photo for several seconds, suddenly the charred face of a woman appears in the reflection of the frame
The charred woman runs at the electrician
Joe is attacked from behind by another charred figure
A picture falls off the wall, startling Anne
The charred woman grabs Harry
Daniella sees the charred woman in the rear vision mirror, she is then impaled through the stomach
A door slams shut
Paul sees two charred figures in the doorway, he then turns to his wife in bed but there is a shrivelled corpse in her place
Jacob is pushed back on his chair by an unseen force
May is shot in the head as she opens the door and blood splatters onto the camera
A man is impaled through the stomach by one of the charred people
A man is grabbed around the ankle by one of the charred figures
Hank suddenly shouts “I’m sorry.” While not a jump scare, it is sudden and extremely loud, enough to clip the microphone
Emma puts the camera down and as she moves out of the center point, the Slenderman is revealed to be standing right behind her
As Emma backs out of the school driveway, Chase points the camera at the Slenderman standing behind the building, followed by the camera glitching and an extremely loud yell
Hank turns around to look at Danny and the Slenderman is standing right behind him
A stack of hay suddenly falls in front of Emma
Emma turns around and the Slenderman is standing behind her
Chase shines the phone’s flashlight on the Slenderman
Kyle suddenly fires the gun
All of the screens suddenly turn into a close-up of the Slenderman
